Description: We offer world-class care in specialties including neurosurgery, orthopedics and cancer services.

Our inpatient services include child and adolescent, adult and senior units, as well as substance use or opioid use disorder treatment, including services tailored for health care professionals dealing with addiction.

Address: 101 St. Andrews Lane, Glen Cove, NY 11542
Description: Glen Cove Hospital, specializing in treating surgical, emergency & critical care patients, is an award-winning member of Northwell Health.
We offer exceptional care in a wide range of specialties, including orthopedics, cancer and neurology.
Northwell Greenwich Village Hospital blends health and wellness services with access to 24-hour emergency care and a full range of medical specialists.
Manhattan Eye, Ear & Throat Hospital (MEETH) is a specialized center that opened its doors almost 150 years ago with a focus on high-quality care for eye, ear and throat conditions.

Our hospital provides comprehensive care for the Nassau and southeastern Queens communities, with extensive expertise in areas including cardiology, gastroenterology, urology, wound care, general and vascular surgery, emergency medicine and orthopedics.
Plainview Hospital offers exceptional care in specialties including pediatric urology surgery, hyperbaric medicine and women's services.
